00038 #ifndef _PLT_HTTP_SERVER_TASK_H_
00039 #define _PLT_HTTP_SERVER_TASK_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 #include "PltHttp.h"
00046 #include "PltDatagramStream.h"
00047 #include "PltThreadTask.h"
00048 
00049 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 |   PLT_HttpServerSocketTask class
00051 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 class PLT_HttpServerSocketTask : public PLT_ThreadTask
00059 {
00060     friend class PLT_ThreadTask;
00061 
00062 public:
00063     PLT_HttpServerSocketTask(NPT_Socket* socket, bool stay_alive_forever = false);
00064 
00065 protected:
00066     virtual ~PLT_HttpServerSocketTask();
00067 
00068 protected:
00069     // Request callback handler
00070     virtual NPT_Result SetupResponse(NPT_HttpRequest&              request, 
00071                                      const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00072                                      NPT_HttpResponse&             response) = 0;
00073 
00074     // overridables
00075     virtual NPT_Result GetInputStream(NPT_InputStreamReference& stream);
00076     virtual NPT_Result GetInfo(NPT_SocketInfo& info);
00077 
00078     // PLT_ThreadTask methods
00079     virtual void DoAbort() { if (m_Socket) m_Socket->Cancel(); }
00080     virtual void DoRun();
00081 
00082 private:
00083     virtual NPT_Result Read(NPT_BufferedInputStreamReference& buffered_input_stream, 
00084                             NPT_HttpRequest*&                 request,
00085                             NPT_HttpRequestContext*           context = NULL);
00086     virtual NPT_Result Write(NPT_HttpResponse* response, 
00087                              bool&             keep_alive, 
00088                              bool              headers_only = false);
00089     virtual NPT_Result RespondToClient(NPT_HttpRequest&              request, 
00090                                        const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00091                                        NPT_HttpResponse*&            response);
00092     
00093 protected:
00094     NPT_Socket*         m_Socket;
00095     bool                m_StayAliveForever;
00096 };
00097 
00098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 |   PLT_HttpServerTask class
00100 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00105 class PLT_HttpServerTask : public PLT_HttpServerSocketTask
00106 {
00107 public:
00108     PLT_HttpServerTask(NPT_HttpRequestHandler* handler, 
00109                        NPT_Socket*             socket, 
00110                        bool                    keep_alive = false) : 
00111         PLT_HttpServerSocketTask(socket, keep_alive), m_Handler(handler) {}
00112 
00113 protected:
00114     virtual ~PLT_HttpServerTask() {}
00115 
00116     NPT_Result SetupResponse(NPT_HttpRequest&              request, 
00117                              const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00118                              NPT_HttpResponse&             response) {
00119         return m_Handler->SetupResponse(request, context, response);
00120     }
00121 
00122 protected:
00123     NPT_HttpRequestHandler* m_Handler;
00124 };
00125 
00126 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 |   PLT_HttpListenTask class
00128 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133 class PLT_HttpListenTask : public PLT_ThreadTask
00134 {
00135 public:
00136     PLT_HttpListenTask(NPT_HttpRequestHandler* handler, 
00137                        NPT_TcpServerSocket*    socket, 
00138                        bool                    owns_socket = true) : 
00139         m_Handler(handler), m_Socket(socket), m_OwnsSocket(owns_socket) {}
00140 
00141 protected:
00142     virtual ~PLT_HttpListenTask() { 
00143         if (m_OwnsSocket && m_Socket) delete m_Socket;
00144     }
00145 
00146 protected:
00147     // PLT_ThreadTask methods
00148     virtual void DoAbort() { if (m_Socket) m_Socket->Cancel(); }
00149     virtual void DoRun() {
00150         while (!IsAborting(0)) {
00151             NPT_Socket* client = NULL;
00152             NPT_Result  result = m_Socket->WaitForNewClient(client, 5000);
00153             if (NPT_FAILED(result)) {
00154                 // cleanup just in case
00155                 if (client) delete client;
00156                 
00157                 // normal error
00158                 if (result == NPT_ERROR_TIMEOUT) continue;
00159                 
00160                 // exit on other errors
00161                 //NPT_LOG_WARNING_2("PLT_HttpListenTask exiting with %d (%s)", result, NPT_ResultText(result));
00162                 break;
00163             } else {
00164                 PLT_ThreadTask* task = new PLT_HttpServerTask(m_Handler, client);
00165                 if (NPT_FAILED(m_TaskManager->StartTask(task))) {
00166                     task->Kill();
00167                     delete client;
00168                 }
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }
00172 
00173 protected:
00174     NPT_HttpRequestHandler* m_Handler;
00175     NPT_TcpServerSocket*    m_Socket;
00176     bool                    m_OwnsSocket;
00177 };
00178 
00179 #endif /* _PLT_HTTP_SERVER_TASK_H_ */
